text: The High Court of Sindh is the highest judicial institution of Sindh province. Established in 1906, it is in the provincial capital, Karachi. Apart from being the highest Court of Appeal for Sindh in civil and criminal matters, the Court was the District Court and the Court of Session in Karachi. ==References== Category:Sindh Category:1906 establishments in Asia Category:Karachi Category:20th-century establishments in Pakistan Category:Pakistani courts
title: Sindh High Court
